awd_titl_txt: YSP:  University of Texas Medical Branch's Summer Research  Program for High School Students
awd_abstract_narration: The University of Texas Medical Branch will continue an eight-week,             commuter and residential Young Scholars project in biochemistry and life        science for 16 students entering grades 11,12.                                                                                                                  Each student will be placed for eight weeks in an ongoing research              project.  Under the guidance of a faculty preceptor, the student will           learn a set of skills or techniques in order to contribute to the               research effort.
org_div_long_name: Division of Research on Learning in Formal and Informal Settings (DRL)

inst.inst_name: University of Texas Medical Branch at Galveston
inst.org_lgl_bus_name: UNIVERSITY OF TEXAS MEDICAL BRANCH AT GALVESTON
